content: Feeling overwhelmed by work is normal, but resigning from your job may not be the best solution. Before taking any drastic action, consider taking some time to evaluate your current situation and identify the root cause of your stress. In addition, you may want to try talking to your supervisor or HR representative to see if there are any ways to reduce your workload or manage your schedule more effectively. If you're dealing with burnout, you may want to take a break from work to rest and recharge. Finally, consider seeking support from a mental health professional or counselor who can help you manage your stress and develop healthy coping strategies. Remember, there are always options available to help you manage your stress and improve your work-life balance.
